department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Public Health Agency of Canada Winnipeg, Manitoba has a requirement for supply, delivery, and offloading of 2 HEPA filter housings and 4 HEPA filters.
duration_in_months: You must complete the Contract within the period beginning on the date of the Contract and ending on 28 February 2033
